subject: Baseball
Coaches and Managers
lead_paragraph: It came as little surprise that the Mets hired Kevin Long, the hitting coach the Yankees dismissed this month, given the struggles of Curtis Granderson, the former Yankee who became the Mets’ most expensive free-agent signing in years.
snippet: It came as little surprise that the Mets hired Kevin Long, the hitting coach the Yankees dismissed this month, given the struggles of Curtis Granderson, the former Yankee who became the Mets’ most expensive free-agent signing in years.
